footer.subscribe: Iyandikishe kugira ngo tubane buri cyumweru
footer.subscribeDesc: Wakire amakuru buri cyumweru. Komeza kwiyubaka no guhuza na Imana.
footer.description: International Anglican Revival Ministries - Umuryango w'Abakristu wihariye washinzwe kwiyubaka mu mutima, umwete, no gukorera.
footer.copyright: © {year} International Anglican Revival Ministries. Uburenganzira bwose burarinzwe.

home.title: Murakaza neza muri International Anglican Revival Ministries
home.subtitle: Umuryango w'Abakristu wihariye washinzwe kwiyubaka mu mutima, umwete, no gukorera hamwe
home.bibleVerse: Mwese abarushye n'abaremerewe, nimuze munsange ndabaruhura.
home.welcomeMessage1: Twishimiye kandi dufite umunezero wo kwakira ku rubuga rwacu rw'ibanze rwa International Anglican Revival Ministries. Niba ukoresheje urubuga rwacu bwa mbere cyangwa wari umwe mu muryango wacu wihariye, nyamuneka menya ko wakunzwe, wahawe agaciro, kandi wakiriwe neza.
home.welcomeMessage2: Iyi website yashinzwe kugira ngo ibe inkomoko y'umwete, inyigisho z'umutima, n'umuryango, ituma dukomeza gufatanya mu kwemera kwawe.
home.welcomeMessage3: Dukomeza gukorana n'imiryango ya hafi n'ya ikure, gusangira urukundo rw'Imana no gukorera hamwe n'umwete.

about.title: Twebwe
about.church: International Anglican Revival Ministries ni umuryango w'Abakristu wihariye kwiyubaka mu mutima, kwiyubaka mu mutima, no gukorera abandi. Turi Pentekoste/Protestanti ishinzwe kwamamaza Inkuru Nziza, gufasha imiryango, no guha abemera imbaraga zo gukomeza ubuzima bwihariye kandi buzima.
about.congregation: Dufasha umuryango w'Abakristu wihariye i Edmonton, harimo Abakanada n'Abanyafurika, dukoresha icyongereza no gufasha mu gifaransa n'Ikinyarwanda.
about.ministry: Minisiteri yacu iri hanze ya Canada, dukorana n'amadini muri Afurika no gufasha abimukira, abapfakazi, imfubyi, n'impunzi muri Uganda, Kenya, Rwanda, n'indi mihana.
about.visionText: Guhuza imiryango n'imiryango, i Edmonton no kwisi hose, kwiyubaka kwihariye, kwiyubaka mu mutima, n'amahirwe y'ukwemera byongera ubuzima bwuzuye no guhinduka kwihariye.
about.missionText: Intego yacu ni uguha imbaraga abantu n'imiryango binyuze mu kwiyubaka mu mutima, gufashwa mu muryango, no kwiyubaka kwihariye. Dushyira mu bikorwa inzozi zihariye zifasha imiryango y'Abakristu kuzirikana ubushobozi bwabo bahawe n'Imana.
marksList: Guhangana no guhindura imiterere idahagije mu muryango.
Gufasha gufungura amatorero hirya no hino muri Africa kwiyubaka mu mutima.
Gushyira mu bikorwa ubwiyunge no kwiyubaka mu muryango.
Gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda zifasha abimukira n'imiryango y'Abakristu muri Afurika.
about.pastor: Intumwa Rev. Jean Sengiyumva, Pasitoli Mukuru
about.pastorBio: Intumwa Rev. Sengiyumva ni Uwahamagawe n'Imana wihariye, afite umwete wo gukorera mu ndimi nyinshi. Akorera mu cyongereza, igifaransa n'Ikinyarwanda kugira ngo ageze kure ubutumwa bwiza ndetse akorane n'imiryango yihariye. Intego ye yavuye muri Yeremiya 20:9, atwarwa ijambo ry'Imana nk'umuriro ugurumana muri we.
about.coreValuesDesc: Iyi ni incamake y'indandagaciro z'ibanze ziyobora ibintu byose dukora nk'umuryango, zikorana n'intego yacu, ndetse na minisiteri

values.title: Kwemera
values.description: Twemera ijambo ry'Imana n'isezerano rye, dukomeza ubuzima bwo kwemera. Kwemera kwacu Yesu Kristo ni ishingiro ry'ikiliziya yacu.

values.title: Urukundo
values.description: Twerekana urukundo rw'ukuri rwa Kristo ku bantu bose, dukoresha umwete, ubwoba, no kwakira bose n'ubwo batuye aho.

values.title: Gukorera
values.description: Dukorera Imana n'abandi binyuze mu kwiyubaka no kwiyubaka, dukurikira urugero rwa Kristo rw'ubuyobozi bwo gukorera mu muryango wacu no hanze.

values.title: Umuryango
values.description: Duha agaciro gakomeye amahame bw'ukuri n'ubwoba, dukomeza umuryango urakaza aho bose bakorera kandi bakomeza kwiyubaka hamwe mu kwemera.

values.title: Amabwiriza
values.description: Duha agaciro gakomeye ubuzima bwo kwemera, kwiyubaka, n'ibyemezo by'ukuri, dukoresha imiterere ya Kristo mu bikorwa byacu byose n'ibyemezo.

about.statementOfFaithDesc: Twemera ukuri kw'ibanze kw'ukwemera kwa Gikristo nk'uko kugaragara mu Byanditswe Byera.
statementOfFaithItems: Twemera Imana imwe, ikomeje kubaho mu batu batatu: Data, Umwana, n'Umwuka Wera.

Twemera ubwami bw'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, kuza kw'Umwana w'Imana, mu buzima butagira icyaha, mu bikorwa by'ibitangaza, mu rupfu rw'akababaro, mu kuzuka kw'umubiri, no mu kuzamuka ku kuboko kw'iburyo kwa Data.
Twemera umurimo w'Umwuka Wera, ukoresha, uwemeye Kristo kugira ngo abeho ubuzima bw'ukwemera.
Twemera Bibiliya nk'ijambo ry'Imana ryahishuwe, ritagira ikosa, kandi rya nyaryo.
Twemera kuzuka kw'abakijijwe n'abazimiye: abakijijwe bazuka mu buzima, abazimiye bazuka mu kuzimira.
Twemera ubwiyunge bw'umwuka ku bemera umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
about.historyDesc: International Anglican Revival Ministries yashinzwe kugira ngo ishake ndetse ifashe abantu bo mu itorero n'abantu bo mu mujyi wa Edmonton, cyane cyane abavuga Ikinyarwanda bashakisha aho basenga bashimira imyizerere y'Ubwongereza n'ibyiyumvo by'Umwuka.
historyContent: Yatangiye n'intego yo guhuza imico n'indimi, itorero ryacu ryatangiye nk'isangano ry'abemera biyemeje gusangiza Inkuru Nziza mu rurimi rw'Icyongereza n'iKinyarwanda.
Mu myaka yashize, twagize umuryango ukomeye ushaka gufasha abantu bo mu mujyi wa Edmonton, ariko kandi dukomeza gufasha abantu bo mu bindi bihugu byo muri Afurika.
Uyu munsi, turi urumuri rw'icyizere, dutanga inama z'umwuka, gufasha abaturage, n'ubufasha bw'ukuri ababukeneye, hano n'ahandi hatandukanye ku isi.

ministries.title: Minisiteri zacu
ministries.subtitle: Menya uko wafasha no kwiyubaka mu kwemera binyuze muri minisiteri zacu zitandukanye.
ministries.worshipDesc: Serivisi z'abasenga zihariye zishimira kubana n'Imana binyuze mu kuramya, amasengesho, n'ibyishimo.
ministries.youthDesc: Gufasha abakuru binyuze mu kwigisha, gukorana, n'amahirwe yo kwiyubaka mu mutima.
ministries.childrenDesc: Gufasha abana binyuze mu kwigisha, ibikorwa, no gufashwa mu mwanya wuzuye.
ministries.womenDesc: Gufasha abagore binyuze mu kwigisha Bibiliya, gukorana, no gufashwa.
ministries.menDesc: Gufasha abagabo binyuze mu kwiyubaka, gufashwa, no kwigisha Bibiliya.
ministries.missionsDesc: Kwongera urukundo rw'Imana kwisi binyuze mu gukorana, gahunda z'ubufasha, no gukorera mu muryango.
ministries.refugeeSupportDesc: Itorero ryacu rikorana n'amadini n'imiryango y'Abimukira muri Uganda, Kenya, na Rwanda. Binyuze mu gukorana dushyira mu bikorwa ubufasha ku miryango y'Abakristu, gufasha abana b'imukira mu kwiga, gutanga Bibiliya n'ibindi bikoresho, gahunda z'umuryango, no gufasha amadini y'Abakristu.

services.title: Igihe cy'Amateraniro
services.sundayDesc: Dufatanye kuri serivisi yacu yo gusenga yihariye ifite inyigisho zihariye, umuziki wihariye, n'amahame mazima.
services.prayerDesc: Inama y'amasengesho y'icyumweru, gufashwa, no kwiyubaka mu mutima.
services.bibleDesc: Kwiyubaka muri Bibiliya binyuze mu biganiro, ibibazo, no gukoresha.

sermons.title: Inkuru nziza n'Amajambo
sermons.comingSoon: Inkuru nziza nshya ziza vuba. Garuka buri gihe kugira ngo ubone amakuru.
sermons.workingOn: Dukorana kugira ngo duhe inkuru nziza zacu n'amajambo. Garuka vuba cyangwa dufatanye mu muntu mu bwoba bwacu bwa buri cyumweru.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Dushaka kumva kuri wowe. Twandikire uyu munsi!
contact.supportMinistryDesc: Gutanga kwawe kwihariye kutuma dukomeza intego yacu yo gukorera imiryango i Edmonton no kwisi. Inkunga yose ihindura.
contact.eventsResourcesDesc: Komeza gukorana n'umuryango wacu binyuze mu byabaye n'ibikoresho by'ubufasha.
contact.upcomingEventsDesc: Garuka vuba kugira ngo ubone ibyabaye n'ibikorwa bizaza. Dukorana gahunda z'ubwoba, amahugurwa, n'ubwoba mu muryango.

resources.bibleStudyDesc: Gera ku nkuru n'ibikoresho byo kwiyubaka mu mutima.
resources.prayerRequestsDesc: Ohereza ibyo usaba gusengwa kandi injira mu muryango w'amasengesho.
resources.ministryResourcesDesc: Ibikoresho byo gukorera mu minisiteri zitandukanye.
resources.communitySupportDesc: Amakuru ku serivisi z'umuryango n'gahunda z'ubufasha.

contact.getInvolvedDesc: Twakira abakwigira bashaka gukorera no guhindura mu muryango wacu. Niba ushaka umuziki, minisiteri y'abana, ubwoba, cyangwa gukorera, hari aho wakorera mu Kiliziya y'Ubwongereza y'Ubwoba y'Isi yose i Edmonton.

africa.title: Akazi kacu muri Afurika
africa.description: Ikiliziya yacu ikorana n'amadini n'imiryango y'Abimukira muri Uganda, Kenya, na Rwanda. Binyuze mu gukorana dushyira mu bikorwa:

partners.title: Abafatanyabikorwa
partners.organizations: Amashyirahamwe y'Abakristu adufasha akazi kajyanye n'amabwiriza
partners.individuals: Abafasha b'Abakristu bafite umwete wo gufasha n'Inkuru Nziza

volunteer.title: Kwigira
volunteer.subtitle: Korera muri minisiteri zitandukanye no guhindura mu muryango wacu.
volunteer.opportunitiesDesc: Twakira abakwigira bashaka gukorera no guhindura mu muryango wacu. Niba ushaka umuziki, minisiteri y'abana, ubwoba, cyangwa gukorera, hari aho wakorera mu Kiliziya y'Ubwongereza y'Ubwoba y'Isi yose i Edmonton.
volunteer.readyDesc: Uzuze fomu iri iburyo kugira ngo utangire. Tuzakuvugana vuba kugira ngo dusobanure uko wakorera mu muryango wacu.

membership.title: Kuba umunyamuryango
membership.subtitle: Injira mu muryango w'itorero kandi ube umunyamuryango w'ukuri.
membership.processDesc: Kuba umunyamuryango wa International Anglican Revival Ministries bivuze kwiyemeza kuba mu muryango wacu, intego, n'icherekezo. Twakira bose bashaka kuba mu muryango w'itorero ryacu.
membership.attendDesc: Gufatanya buri gihe mu kuri no kumenya umuryango wacu neza.
membership.classDesc: Gufatanya mu kwiyobora kw'ubunyamuryango kugira ngo wige ibyiringiro, intego, n'icherekezo.
membership.commitmentDesc: Kwiyemeza gufasha itorero binyuze mu masengesho, gukorera abandi, no gutanga.
membership.readyDesc: Uzuza iyi fomu y'ubunyamuryango iri iburyo kugira ngo utangire urugendo rwawe rw'ubunyamuryango. Tuzakuvugisha vuba kugira ngo tugusobanurire intambwe zikurikira.

prayer.title: Gusenga
prayer.subtitle: Injira mu matsinda yacu y'amasengesho n'amahame y'abanyamasengesho.
prayer.ministryDesc: Umusengesho uri mu mutima w'ikiliziya yacu. Twemera imbaraga z'umusengesho kandi dushishikariza bose gufata uruhare mu bwoba bw'amasengesho bwacu.
prayer.weeklyDesc: Dufatanye buri Ku wa Kabiri saa saba z'amanywa ku nama yacu y'amasengesho y'icyumweru.
prayer.requestsDesc: Ohereza icyifuzo usaba gusengera, itsinda ryacu ry'abanyamasengesho rizagusengera.
prayer.teamDesc: Injira mu itsinda ryacu ry'abasenga bashishikaye basenga buri gihe mu itorero, mu muryango, no ku isi hose.
prayer.joinDesc: Uzuza iyi fomu iri iburyo kugira ngo ohereze icyifuzo usaba gusengera. Itsinda ryacu ry'abanyamasengesho rizagusengera.

baptism.title: Kubatizwa
baptism.subtitle: Gufata intambwe ikurikira mu rugendo rwawe rw'ukwemera binyuze mu kubatizwa.
baptism.aboutDesc: Kubatizwa ni kwerekana mu muryango kwemera Yesu Kristo kwawe. Berekana kwemera kwawe gupfa, guhambwa, no guzuka kwa Kristo, n'kwiyemeza kumukurikira kwawe.
baptism.whyDesc: Ni itegeko riva kuri Yesu Kristo (Matayo 28:19-20)
baptism.whyDesc2: Ni kwerekana mu muryango kwemera kwawe
baptism.whyDesc3: Ni intambwe y'kwumvira mu rugendo rwawe rw'ubukristu
baptism.processDesc: Niba witeguye kubatizwa, dushaka kugufasha gufata iyi ntambwe ihambaye. Uzuza iyi fomu iri iburyo kugira ngo:
baptism.process2: Wige byinshi ku ibyerekeye ibisobanuro byo kubatizwa
baptism.readyDesc: Uzuza iyi fomu iri iburyo kugira ngo ohereze icyo usaba kubatizwa. Tuzakuvugisha vuba kugira ngo duhagurure gahunda yo kubatizwa kwawe.

donate.title: Tanga
donate.subtitle: Gutanga kwawe kwihariye gutuma dukomeza intego yacu yo gukorera imiryango i Edmonton no ku isi hose.
donate.inPersonDesc: Urashobora gutanga muri gahunda yacu ya buri Kwezi cyangwa gutanga incuro imwe gusa.
donate.eTransferDesc: Ohereza e-transfer kuri imeyili y'itorero. Twandikire kugira ngo ubone aderesi y'imeyili n'ibijyanye n'umutekano.
donate.bankTransferDesc: Kugira ngo utange buri gihe cyangwa wohereze amafaranga menshi, twandikire kugira ngo ubone amakuru ya compte yacu ya banki.
donate.everyGiftDesc: Inkunga zawe zifasha minisiteri zacu, misioni, ubwoba mu muryango, n'ibikorwa by'ikiliziya. Icyo cyose gitanga, n'icyo gito, gihindura mu kwongera ubwami bw'Imana.

servicesSermons.title: Amabwiriza n'Inkuru nziza
servicesSermons.subtitle: Dufatanye mu gusenga, amasengesho, n'amakuru meza mu cyumweru.
servicesSermons.whatToExpectDesc: Serivisi zacu ni nziza kandi zirimo inyigisho nzima kandi zihariye, kuramya kwihariye, n'amahame meza yuzuye. Dusenga mu cyongereza n'Ikinyarwanda. Niba ugarutse kudusura cyangwa waba umunyamuryango wacu, uzabona aho wiyubaka no kwiyubaka mu kwemera.

foundation.title: Shelter of Refugee Seniors International Ministries (SRSIM)
foundation.subtitle: Gukorera abimukira b'Abakristu, abakuze, n'imiryango yabuze ababo binyuze mu kwiyubaka n'amahame mazima
foundation.aboutDesc: Shelter of Refugee Seniors International Ministries (SRSIM) ni minisiteri y'ubushake ishinzwe gukorera abimukira b'Abakristu, abakuze, n'imiryango yabuze ababo. Dutanga inkunga, ibikoresho, n'icyizere ku bantu babuze ababo binyuze mu ntambara, kwiyubaka, cyangwa imihindagurikire  y'ikirere.
foundation.missionText: Gutanga amazu, inkunga, n'icyizere cyo kwiyubaka ku bantu b'Abakristu b'Abimukira n'imiryango yabuze ababo, kubafasha kwiyubaka mu ubuzima bwabo binyuze mu kwiyubaka n'icyizere mu gihe dushyira mu bikorwa urukundo rwa Kristo.
foundation.missionText1: Gufasha bwuzuye, harimo ubwoba bw'umubiri, ubwoba bw'umutima, n'ubwoba bw'umutima, ku bantu b'Abimukira b'Abakuru, dutanga amazu, ubwoba bw'ubuzima, gufasha, no guhuza mu muryango.
foundation.missionText2: Intego yacu ni ukurinda agaciro no kwongera ubuzima bw'Abimukira b'Abakuru binyuze mu gutanga amazu, kugera ku bwoba bw'ubuzima, gufasha, no kwiyubaka, byashinzwe mu kwemera n'umwete.
foundation.missionText3: Dushyira mu bikorwa gukorera abimukira b'Abakuru binyuze mu gutanga amazu meza, ibiribwa byuzuye, ubwoba bw'umuryango n'umutima, n'ibikoresho kugira ngo babafashe kwiyubaka icyizere no gufatanya neza mu muryango.
foundation.visionText: Isi aho buri muntu w'Umukristu  w'Amwimukira n'umuryango wabuze ababo, ibikoresho by'ibanze, inkunga y'amasengesho, n'amahirwe yo kwiyubaka mu ubuzima bwabo binyuze mu kwiyubaka n'icyizere.
foundation.visionText1: Isi aho buri muntu w'Umukristu w'Abimukira w'Abakuru abaho n'agaciro, umutekano, n'amahoro, wakiriwe n'umuryango ufasha.
foundation.visionText2: Kuba aho abimukira b'Abakuru bashobora kubona icyizere no kwiyubaka, aho ubwoba, umwete, n'agaciro byongera imbaraga n'ukwiyubaka.
foundation.visionText3: Aho abimukira b'Abakuru bahawe ubushobozi bwo kubaho ubuzima bwuzuye n'ubuzima bwuzuye, batagira ubwoba no kutagira ubwoba.

valuesList.title: Umwete
valuesList.desc: Dukomeza buri muntu binyuze mu kwiyubaka, gusobanukirwa, n'umwete w'ukuri.

valuesList.title: Amahame mazima
valuesList.desc: Dukomeza kandi dukomeza agaciro k'ibanze k'umuntu wese, dukoresha bose binyuze mu kwiyubaka.

valuesList.title: Gukorera Abandi
valuesList.desc: Dushishikaye gukorera abandi binyuze mu kwiyubaka, dukurikira urugero rwa Kristo rw'ubuyobozi bwo gukorera abandi.

valuesList.title: Icyizere
valuesList.desc: Dutanga si gusa inkunga y'ibikoresho, ahubwo n'umwete w'umutima n'icyizere cy'ubuzima bwiza.

valuesList.title: Amabwiriza mazima
valuesList.desc: Dukorana n'imiryango y'Abakristu, amadini, n'amashyirahamwe kugira ngo dongere ingaruka zacu.

programsList.title: Amazu
programsList.desc: Gutanga amazu meza kandi meza ku bantu b'Abakristu b'Abimukira n'imiryango basize amazu.

programsList.title: Ibiribwa
programsList.desc: Gukomeza kugera ku biribwa byuzuye n'umutekano w'ibiribwa ku miryango y'Abakristu n'abakuru.

programsList.title: Inkunga y'Ubuzima
programsList.desc: Guhuza abimukira n'ubwoba bwo kwiyubaka bw'ubuzima n'inkunga y'ubwoba.

programsList.title: Uburezi n'Amahugurwa
programsList.desc: Gutanga amahirwe y'uburezi n'amahugurwa y'ubuhanga kubafasha kwiyubaka ubuzima bwabo.

programsList.title: Intego yo Kwiyubaka
programsList.desc: Gutanga ubwoba bwo kwiyubaka, kwiyubaka Bibiliya, n'inkunga y'umutima kugira ngo dukomeze kwemera n'icyizere.

programsList.title: Kwiyubaka mu Muryango
programsList.desc: Gukomeza imiryango y'Abakristu aho abimukira bashobora kubona ubwoba n'inkunga y'Abakristu.

foundation.recentActivity1: Twatanze ibikoresho by'ubwoba ku bantu 85 b'Abimukira b'Abakuru mu gisagara cy'Abimukira cya Mbarara muri Uganda. Ibi byatwaranze $1,000 USD.

challengesList.title: Ubwoba bw'Ubwoba n'Ibiterwa
challengesList.desc: Igihe intambara itangira (urugero: muri North Kivu, DRC), abantu b'Abakuru ni bo bahura n'ibyago byinshi. Benshi ntibashobora kwiruka vuba kandi bakagira ubwoba. Abantu b'Abakuru benshi bakomeza mu turere tw'ubwoba twatewe n'umwanya, cyangwa mu mazu y'igihe gito nk'amashuri, benshi batagira ibikoresho by'ibanze.

challengesList.title: Kutagira Ibiribwa n'Indyo
challengesList.desc: Abimukira b'Abakuru benshi baza batagira ibiribwa cyangwa ubushobozi bwo gutunga. Inyungu zabo z'indyo ntizuzura, cyane cyane niba bafite ingorane zo gukaraga, indwara zidahinduka, cyangwa bakeneye indyo zihariye.

challengesList.title: Ingorane z'Ubuzima, Indwara zidahinduka n'Ubwoba bw'Ubuzima
challengesList.desc: Abimukira b'Abakuru benshi bafite indwara z'ubuzima zidahinduka zahari mbere (urugero: ubwoba bw'amaraso, indwara z'ibyonga) zikeneye gufashwa guhoraho n'imiti. Intambara n'ubwoba byongera ibi. Kugera ku mazi meza n'ubwoba bw'ubwoba ni ingorane nkomeye; amazi mabi yongera ubwoba bw'indwara ziva mu mazi na kolera. Serivisi z'ubuzima mu gisagara ntizigira ubwoba bw'ubwoba bw'Abakuru cyangwa serivisi zihagije ku bantu b'Abakuru bafite ubwoba bw'ubwoba cyangwa ubwoba bw'ubwoba.

challengesList.title: Amazu, Umutekano n'Ibiterwa
challengesList.desc: Amazu ashobora kutagira ubwoba (akata, agizwe n'abantu benshi, adafite ubwoba bw'ubwoba, adahagije ku bantu bafite ubwoba bw'ubwoba). Ibikoresho by'ubwoba (amazu y'ubwoba, amazu y'ubwoba) bishobora kuba ingorane kugera cyangwa gukoresha ku bantu bafite ubwoba cyangwa bafite ubwoba bw'ubwoba. Imyanya y'ubwoba cyangwa ibikoresho by'ubwoba byari kure ni ingorane.

challengesList.title: Kutagira Ubwoba bw'Ubwoba, Kurinda, n'Agaciro
challengesList.desc: Abimukira b'Abakuru benshi bivuze kwangirika kw'umuryango cyangwa ubwoba bw'ubwoba bw'ubwoba. Abantu b'Abakuru bari bwawe kandi bakagira ubwoba ku bandi. Hari ubwoba bw'ubwoba, gukoresha (mu magambo, mu mubiri, mu bwoba bw'ubwoba) cyane cyane ku bagore b'Abakuru. Amakuru amwe avuga ko abantu b'Abakuru mu gisagara bafite ubwoba bw'ubwoba, bakagira ubwoba bw'ubwoba. Ingorane z'ubwoba bw'ubwoba, harimo ubwoba bw'ubwoba, agahinda, kwangirika, n'ubwoba bw'ubwoba, ni ingorane nkomeye.

solutionsList.title: Gufasha Abimukira b'Abakuru
solutionsList.desc: Dufasha uburenganzira n'inyungu z'Abimukira b'Abakuru, dukomeza ko amajwi yabo yumvwa kandi agaciro kabo karindwa.

solutionsList.title: Gutanga Amafaranga
solutionsList.desc: Dukorana kugira ngo dufate amafaranga yo gufasha minisiteri zacu no gutanga serivisi z'ibanze ku bantu b'Abimukira b'Abakuru.

solutionsList.title: Kwiyubaka mu Mutima
solutionsList.desc: Dutanga kwiyubaka mu mutima kugira ngo dufashe abimukira b'Abakuru gukomeza neza, dutanga icyizere, umwete, n'imbaraga binyuze mu kwemera.

foundation.impactDesc: Binyuze mu gahunda zacu, twashoboye gufasha imiryango myinshi y'Abimukira n'abakuru mu bihugu bitandukanye, dukoresha ibikoresho by'ibanze, ubwoba bwo kwiyubaka, n'icyizere cy'ubuzima bwiza.
foundation.getInvolvedDesc: Urashobora guhindura ubuzima bw'Abakristu b'Abimukira n'imiryango yasize amazu. Dufatanye mu ntego yacu yo gutanga amazu, inkunga, n'icyizere.
foundation.donateDesc: Inkunga zawe zifasha dukoresha ibikoresho by'ibanze, amazu, n'inkunga ku bantu bakeneye.
foundation.volunteerDesc: Dufatanye n'itsinda ryacu ry'Abakristu bashishikaye bakorera abimukira n'imiryango yasize amazu mu nshingano zitandukanye.
foundation.prayDesc: Senga abimukira dukorera, itsinda ryacu ry'ubwoba, n'umutekano n'umutekano mu turere twahuye n'ubwoba.
foundation.partnerDesc: Amadini n'amashyirahamwe bashobora gufatanya natwe kugira ngo dongere ubwoba bwacu n'ingaruka mu gukorera abimukira kwisi.

cta.title: Dufatanye Umurimo
cta.subtitle: Sangira urukundo rw'Imana mu muryango utanga ikaze, wihariye. Dushaka kuba hamwe nawe!

getInvolvedPage.title: Dufashe
getInvolvedPage.subtitle: Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gukorera no kwiyubaka mu kwemera kwawe. Shaka amahirwe akwiriye.

leadership.title: Abayobozi n'Abakorera mu itorero
leadership.subtitle: Menya abayobozi bashishikaye bayobora kandi bakorera mu muryango w'ikiliziya yacu.
leadership.seniorPastorBio: Intumwa Rev. Sengiyumva ni umusavyi w'Imana wihariye afite umwete wo gukorera mu ndimi nyinshi. Nubwo icyongereza si cyo cyambere, akorera mu gifaransa n'Ikinyarwanda kugira ngo agere n'imiryango yihariye. Intego ye yavukiye muri Yeremiya 20:9, atwara ijambo ry'Imana nk'umuriro mu magufwa ye. Ayobora ikiliziya yacu n'ubwenge, umwete, n'umutima wo gukorera mu muryango w'Abakristu i Edmonton n'akazi kacu k'ubwoba kwisi muri Afurika.
leadership.pastorsDesc: Itsinda ryacu ry'Abapasitoli rikorana n'Umupasitoli Mukuru kugira ngo rihe imbaraga z'umutima, gufashwa n'Abapasitoli, n'ubuyobozi mu minisiteri zitandukanye. Bashishikaye kwiyubaka umuryango w'Abakristu no gufasha intego y'ikiliziya.
leadership.pastor1Bio: Pst. Nkurunziza azana amahirwe menshi mu bwoba bw'abakiri bato n'ubwoba bw'umuryango. Afite umwete wo kwigisha abakiri bato no gukorera imiryango yihariye.
leadership.pastor2Bio: Pst. Mukamana ayobora ubwoba bw'Abagore n'umwete n'ubwenge. Yihaye kwiyubaka abagore binyuze mu kwigisha Bibiliya n'ubufasha bw'ukuri.
leadership.pastor3Bio: Pst. Habimana akurikirana ubwoba bw'ubwoba, ayobora umuryango mu gusenga kw'umutima. Ahuza ubwoba bw'umuziki n'umwete w'umutima.
leadership.pastor4Bio: Pst. Uwimana afite umutima wo gukorera abana n'imiryango. Yubaka ibikorwa byihariye bifasha abana kwiyubaka mu kwemera n'ubumenyi bw'urukundo rw'Imana.
leadership.leader1Bio: Niyonsenga akurikirana ubwoba bw'Abahanzi, akunga amajwi mu gusenga gukomeza gukomeza Imana. Yemeza ko umuziki wacu w'ubwoba wiyubaka kandi wihariye umuryango.
leadership.leader2Bio: Nyirarukundo ayobora amabwiriza n'amahame by'amasengesho, yihaye igihe cyo gusenga ikiliziya, umuryango, n'ibyifuzo byisi. Afite umutima wo gushaka ibyo Imana ishaka binyuze mu musengesho.
leadership.leader3Bio: Ntare akurikirana kandi ayobora abakiri bato bacu, akubaka ibikorwa bifasha abakiri bato kwiyubaka mu kwemera n'umuco. Afite umwete wo kwiyubaka abakiri bato b'igihe gikurikira mu gukorera.
leadership.leader4Bio: Nyiramugisha akurikirana akazi kacu k'ubwoba, akurikirana ubufasha bw'imiryango y'imukira n'imiryango yihariye. Yemeza ko akazi kacu k'ubwoba kagera ku bantu bakeneye.
leadership.otherLeadersDesc: Ikiliziya yacu yihaye abayobozi bashishikaye bakorera mu nshingano zitandukanye harimo abayobozi b'ubwoba, abadiyakoni, n'abakorera mu gukorera. Abasavyi b'ukuri bafasha gukomeza ibikorwa by'ikiliziya kandi bafasha intego yacu yo gukorera Imana n'umuryango wacu.

privacy.title: Politiki y'Ubwigenge
privacy.subtitle: Ubwigenge bwawe buhagararariye ubundi. Menya uko dukusanya, dukoresha, kandi turinda amakuru yawe.

introduction.title: Intangiriro
introduction.content: International Anglican Revival Ministries ('twebwe', 'yacu', cyangwa 'twe') ishinzwe gukingira ubwigenge bwawe. Iyi Politiki y'Ubwigenge isobanura uko dukusanya, dukoresha, kwerekana, kandi dukingira amakuru yawe igihe wongeye gukoresha urubuga rwacu, gukoresha serivisi zacu, cyangwa gukorana natwe. Nyamuneka iyi politiki y'ubwigenge neza. Niba utemeye amabwiriza y'iyi politiki y'ubwigenge, nyamuneka ntukoreshe urubuga.

collection.title: Amakuru Dukusanya
content: Dukusanya amakuru utanga neza, harimo:
Dushobora kandi gukusanya amakuru yihariye ku igaragara ryawe igihe wongeye gukoresha urubuga rwacu, harimo:
list: Amavwiriza (izina, aderesi y'imeyili, numero ya telefoni, aderesi y'ubutumwa)
Amakuru utanga igihe wiyandikisha mu bikorwa, gufasha, cyangwa kuba umunyamuryango
Amakuru y'ubwishyu igihe utanga (abikwa neza binyuze mu bakoresha ubwishyu burinzwe kandi bwizewe)
Amakuru oherejwe binyuze mu mabwiriza y'ubwoba, amasengesho, cyangwa uburyo bwo gukorana
Aderesi yawe ya IP na ubwoko bwa browser
Ipaji wongeyeho kandi igihe wakoresheje kuri buri paji
Aderesi z'urubuga rwohereza
Amakuru y'igaragara rya sisitemu n'ikoreshwa ryayo

usage.title: Uko Dukoresha Amakuru yawe
content: Dukoresha amakuru dukusanya mu ntego zitandukanye, harimo:
list: Gutanga, gukomeza, no kwiyubaka serivisi zacu n'urubuga
Kugira inkunga no gukomeza ibikorwa by'ubucuruzi
Kohereza amakuru, amakuru, n'amakuru ku serivisi zacu n'ibikorwa
Gusubiza ibibazo byawe, amakuru, n'ibyo udusaba
Gukomeza kwiyandikisha kw'Abakristu n'ubunyamuryango wacu
Gukurikira ibyemezo by'amategeko kandi gukingira uburenganzira bwacu
Gusuzuma gukoresha urubuga kandi kwiyubaka n'amabwiriza y'abakoresha

protection.title: Kurinda Amakuru n'Umutekano
content: Dushyira mu bikorwa ibikoresho byuzuye by'umutekano n'umuryango w'umutekano kugira ngo dukingire amakuru yawe binyuze mu kwiyubaka, guhindura, kwerekana, cyangwa kwangiza. Ariko, nta buryo bwohereza binyuze mu Internet cyangwa kubika by'elektroniki ni 100% meza. Mu gihe dushishikaye gukoresha uburyo bwohereza bwohereza kugira ngo dukingire amakuru yawe, ntitwemera gukomeza umutekano wuzuye.

cookies.title: Cookies n'Ibikoresho byo Gukurikira
content: Dukoresha cookies n'ibikoresho byo gukurikira binyuze mu gukurikira ibikorwa ku rubuga rwacu kandi kubika amakuru yihariye. Cookies ni dosiye zifite amakuru make ashobora kuba n'ikimenyetso cyihariye. Urashobora kwerekana browser yawe guhakanira cookies zose cyangwa kwerekana igihe cookie yoherejwe. Ariko, niba utemeye cookies, urashobora kutagira ubushobozi bwo gukoresha amashyirahamwe y'urubuga rwacu.

rights.title: Uburenganzira bwawe bwo Kwiyubaka
content: Bitewe n'aho utuye, urashobora kugira uburenganzira bwo kwiyubaka ku makuru yawe, harimo:
list: Uburenganzira bwo kugera – Ufite uburenganzira bwo gusaba kopi z'amakuru yawe
Uburenganzira bwo guhindura – Ufite uburenganzira bwo gusaba guhindura amakuru atari ukuri
Uburenganzira bwo kwangiza – Ufite uburenganzira bwo gusaba kwangiza amakuru yawe
Uburenganzira bwo gukomeza gukoresha – Ufite uburenganzira bwo gusaba gukomeza gukoresha amakuru yawe
Uburenganzira bwo guhakanira gukoresha – Ufite uburenganzira bwo guhakanira gukoresha kwacu amakuru yawe
Uburenganzira bwo kwimura amakuru – Ufite uburenganzira bwo gusaba kwimura amakuru yawe ku serivisi yindi

children.title: Ubwigenge bw'Abana
content: Urubuga rwacu n' serivisi zacu ntizigamije abana bafite imyaka 13. Ntitukusanya amakuru y'ubwoba ku bana bafite imyaka 13. Niba waba umubyeyi cyangwa umukoresha kandi wemera ko umwana wawe yatanze amakuru y'ubwoba, nyamuneka twandikire vuba.

changes.title: Guhindura Iyi Politiki y'Ubwigenge
content: Dushobora kwiyubaka Politiki yacu y'Ubwigenge buri gihe. Tuzakumenyesha ibihinduka bose binyuze mu gushyira Politiki y'Ubwigenge mushya ku ipaji kandi kwiyubaka itariki y' 'Ihindurwa ryanyuma'. Urakangurwa gusuzuma iyi Politiki y'Ubwigenge buri gihe kugira ngo ubone ibihinduka.

contact.title: Twandikire
content: Niba ufite ibibazo byose ku makuru y'iyi Politiki y'Ubwigenge cyangwa ushaka gukoresha uburenganzira bwawe bwo kwiyubaka, nyamuneka twandikire:
International Anglican Revival Ministries
6110 Fulton Road, Edmonton, AB T6A 3T3, Kanada
Urashobora kandi gukoresha ipaji yacu y'Ubwoba kugira ngo ubone amakuru menshi.

terms.title: Amabwiriza n'Ibyemezo
terms.subtitle: Nyamuneka usome amabwiriza neza mbere yo gukoresha urubuga rwacu n' serivisi.

introduction.title: Intangiriro
introduction.content: Murakaza neza ku rubuga rw'International Anglican Revival Ministries. Binyuze mu kugera kandi gukoresha urubuga rwacu, wemera kandi wemera gukurikira amabwiriza n'ibyemezo by'iyi ntego. Niba utemeye gukurikira ibyo haruguru, nyamuneka ntukoreshe iyi serivisi.

agreement.title: Kwirirana n'Amabwiriza
content: Binyuze mu kugera urubuga rwacu, wemera gukurikira amabwiriza n'Ibyemezo byo Gukoresha, amategeko yose n'ibyemezo, kandi wemera ko wiyubaka gukurikira amategeko y'aho utuye. Niba utemeye amabwiriza yose, wazirirwa gukoresha cyangwa kugera urubuga.

license.title: Gukoresha License
content: Uruhushya rwatanzwe gukusanya kopi imwe y'ibikoresho ku rubuga rw'International Anglican Revival Ministries kugira ngo wiyubake, ntacyo gukoresha ubucuruzi gusa. Iki ni uruhushya, si kwimura umutwe, kandi binyuze mu ruhushya ntushobora:
list: Guhindura cyangwa gukora kopi z'ibikoresho
Gukoresha ibikoresho mu ntego zose z'ubucuruzi cyangwa kwerekana (ubucuruzi cyangwa ntacyo gukoresha ubucuruzi)
Kugerageza guhindura cyangwa guhindura software iri ku rubuga
Kuvura copyright cyangwa ibindi bimenyetso by'ubwoba ku bikoresho
Kwimura ibikoresho ku muntu wundi cyangwa 'gukora kopi' z'ibikoresho ku server yindi

restrictions.title: Ibyirirwa
content: Ibikoresho ku rubuga rw'International Anglican Revival Ministries bitangwa 'nk'uko biri'. International Anglican Revival Ministries ntitanga amasezerano, yerekanye cyangwa yerekanye, kandi binyuze mu ruhushya ikangiza kandi ikangiza amasezerano yose harimo, nta kwangirwa, amasezerano yerekanye cyangwa ibyemezo by'ubucuruzi, gukomeza mu ntego yihariye, cyangwa kutagira ubwoba bw'ubwoba cyangwa ikindi kwangirwa kw'uburenganzira.

disclaimer.title: Guha
content: Ibikoresho bigaragara ku rubuga rw'International Anglican Revival Ministries bishobora kuba n'amakosa y'ubwoba, y'ubwoba, cyangwa y'amashusho. International Anglican Revival Ministries ntitanga amasezerano ko ibikoresho byose ku rubuga rwayo ni ukuri, byuzuye, cyangwa by'ubu. International Anglican Revival Ministries ishobora guhindura ibikoresho birimo ku rubuga rwayo igihe icyo ari cyo cyose nta kumenyesha.

limitations.title: Ibitemewe
content: Nta gihe International Anglican Revival Ministries cyangwa abafasha bayo bazaba bafite imbere bivuga binyuze mu gukoresha cyangwa kutagira ubushobozi bwo gukoresha ibikoresho byo ku rubuga rwa International Anglican Revival Ministries, n'iyo International Anglican Revival Ministries cyangwa umukoresha wemewe wabwiwe mu makuru y'ubushobozi bwo kwangiza.

accuracy.title: Ukuri kw'Ibikoresho
content: Ibikoresho bigaragara ku rubuga rw'International Anglican Revival Ministries bishobora kubamo n'amakosa, cyangwa y'amashusho. International Anglican Revival Ministries ntitanga amasezerano ko ibikoresho byose ku rubuga rwayo ari ukuri, kandi byuzuye. International Anglican Revival Ministries ishobora guhindura ibikoresho biri ku rubuga rwayo igihe icyo ari cyo cyose nta kumenyesha.

links.title: Guhuza
content: International Anglican Revival Ministries ntiyongeye gusuzuma urubuga rwose ruhuza n'urubuga rwayo kandi ntidutatira ibirimo urubuga rwahuza. Gushyira mu bikorwa ihuza ryose ntibisobanura kwemerana na International Anglican Revival Ministries. Gukoresha urubuga ruhuza rwose ni ku bw'ubushake bw'urukoresha.

modifications.title: Guhindura
content: International Anglican Revival Ministries ishobora guhindura amabwiriza y'urubuga rwayo igihe icyo ari cyo cyose nta kumenyesha. Binyuze mu gukoresha urubuga rwacu wemeya gukurikira amabwiriza yacu.

governing.title: Amabwiriza Ayobora
content: Amabwiriza n'ibyemezo byoherejwe binyuze mu byemejwe n'amategeko ya Edmonton, Canada, kandi wemeye kuyoborwa n'amahame y'inkiko z'aho.

contact.title: Uburyo bwo Gukorana
content: Niba ufite ibibazo byose ku makuru n'Amabwiriza n'Ibyemezo, twandikire:
International Anglican Revival Ministries
6110 Fulton Road, Edmonton, AB T6A 3T3, Canada
Urashobora kandi gukoresha ipaji yacu kugira ngo ubone amakuru yacu menshi.
